text: Erik R. P. Zuiderweg (born February 28 or March 28, 1950)https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:KLTN-7WZ is an American biochemist, currently at University of Michigan and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:American biochemists Category:University of Michigan faculty
title: Erik Zuiderweg
